alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 5:47PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of snow showers will affect northeastern Piscataquis...east central Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties... At 545 PM EST...An area of snow showers was along a line extending from Fort Fairfield to near Tamway...and moving south at 25 MPH. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Fort Fairfield, Mapleton, Mars Hill, Ashland, Easton, Bridgewater, Masardis, Mount Chase, Oxbow, South Branch Pond, Dudley Township, Moosehorn Crossing, Telos Lake, Baxter State Park, Scopan, northwestern Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Littleton, Monticello and Blaine. This includes the following highways... US Highway 1 between Monticello and Presque Isle. State Highway 11 between Knowles Corner and Squapan. * Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of snow showers. Sharply colder temperatures following the snow will cause any water or slush to quickly freeze on roads and sidewalks. Untreated road surfaces will become extremely slippery. Reduced speeds and distance between vehicles is advised.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Southeast Aroostook
